pages.text: The $(item)Info Tool$(clear) is the best way to read the state of an active game. You may right click on any of the following components to discover information about the game:$(li)Any ship -> Name of ship, status, abilities$(li)Board tiles -> Status, id$(li)Game Controller -> Opponent ships that aren't destroyed yet. Shift Right Click to see ALL opponent ships.
$(li)Energy Shields, Torpedo Nets and Anti-Air -> Ship/Ability that deployed it, health$(li)Ship Close and Ship Here blocks -> Explanation
